item.title: Unix sockets, the basics in Rust
item.author: Author
item.description: I found myself wondering about unix sockets while working on Sozu, a reverse proxy written in Rust. A bunch of Sōzu issues led me to dig into Sōzu channels, which themselves make use of Metal I/O ’s implementation of unix sockets. Here the questions, summed up: what is a unix socket? what is a unix listener? what is a unix stream? So here we go. What is a unix socket?

item.title: Hello World!
item.author: Author
item.description: This is my very first blog post to test out the Hugo framework.
